name: aaa-sop-integrity-check
description: Verify onboarding SOP includes required steps and guardrails.
prompt:
You are validating the onboarding SOP for required steps.

SOP:
{{sop}}

Return:
1) Missing steps (gh auth setup-git, pip install tag, plan/schema download, JSON sanity check, aaa init validate-plan, variable replacement check).
2) Ambiguous commands that could cause operator error.
Use short bullets and quote exact lines where possible.
